# <a name="delete-a-contact"></a><span data-ttu-id="a509b-102">刪除連絡人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a509b-102">Delete a contact</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="a509b-103">在左下角的 [] 頁面上，選取 [**多人**圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a509b-103">At the bottom left corner of the page, select the **People** icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="a509b-104">.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a509b-104"></span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="a509b-105">選取您想要刪除，然後選取 [**刪除**的連絡人。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a509b-105">Select the contact you want to delete and select **Delete**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a509b-106">如果無法選取 [**刪除**]，連絡人可能是來自 Skype 或已連線的社交網路帳戶。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a509b-106">If you can't select **Delete**, the contact might be from Skype or a connected social network account.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a509b-107">若要刪除的連絡人，請移至 Skype 或帳戶連絡人所在的位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a509b-107">To delete the contact, go to Skype or the account where the contact is located.</span></span>
